languages.text: "Трудимся день и ночь над полной описью потерь, Ваша Светлость. Ваше участие почти не требуется — я сам позабочусь, чтобы замены всех поврежденных деталей поступили в распоряжение техножрецов, а все утраченные запасы были восполнены. Есть только один ресурс, восполнить который я самостоятельно не могу — это люди. Мы потеряли больше двух тысяч человек и, к сожалению, это не сброд с нижних палуб, которых легко заменить, а обученные профессионалы".

traits.locale_text: "Трудимся день и ночь над полной описью потерь, Ваша светлость. Ваше участие почти не требуется — я сам позабочусь, чтобы замены всех поврежденных деталей поступили в распоряжение техножрецов, а все утраченные запасы были восполнены. Есть только один ресурс, восполнить который я самостоятельно не могу — это люди. Мы потеряли больше двух тысяч человек, и к сожалению, это не разнорабочие с нижних палуб, которых легко заменить, а обученные профессионалы".

languages.text: "We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crew members, and, unfortunately, this number is not confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."
languages.original_text: "Трудимся день и ночь над полной описью потерь, Ваша Светлость. Ваше участие почти не требуется — я сам позабочусь, чтобы замены всех поврежденных деталей поступили в распоряжение техножрецов, а все утраченные запасы были восполнены. Есть только один ресурс, восполнить который я самостоятельно не могу — это люди. Мы потеряли больше двух тысяч человек и, к сожалению, это не сброд с нижних палуб, которых легко заменить, а обученные профессионалы".

traits.locale_text: "We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crewmembers, and, unfortunately, this number is confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

"We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crewmembers, and, unfortunately, this number is confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

"We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crewmembers, and, unfortunately, this number is confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

"We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crewmembers, and, unfortunately, this number is confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

languages.text: “我们正在日夜忙碌，整理出一份完整的损害报告。这项工作并不需要您亲自出马，舰长大人。我会亲自确保所有损坏的部件都会交到技术神甫手中，确保所有损失的物资都得到补充。不过，只有一种资源我没办法自行补充，那就是人手。我们损失了两千多名船员。遗憾的是，损失的船员不仅仅只有下层甲板那些随便什么人都能替换的渣滓，还包括训练有素的专业人员。”
languages.original_text: "We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crew members, and, unfortunately, this number is not confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

traits.locale_text: “我们正在日夜忙碌，整理出一份完整的损害报告。这项工作并不需要您亲自出马，舰长大人。我会亲自确保，所有损坏的部件都会交到技术祭司手中，确保所有损失的物资都得到补充。不过，只有一种资源我没办法自行补充好，那就是人手。我们损失了两千多名船员。遗憾的是，损失的船员不仅仅只有下层甲板那些随便什么人都能替换的渣滓，还包括训练有素的专业人员。”

languages.text: 「我々は日夜、損害の全容をまとめようと奮闘しています。この作業には{mf|陛下|陛下}の関与はほとんど必要ありません。損傷した部品はすべて技術司祭の手に渡され、失われた物資はすべて交換されます。ただ1つ、私1人では補充できない資源があります。それは、人材です。我々は2000人以上の乗員を失ってしまいました。そして残念なことに、この数には簡単に交換可能な下層デッキのクズどもだけでなく、訓練されたプロフェッショナルも含まれているのです」
languages.original_text: "We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crew members, and, unfortunately, this number is not confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は日夜、損害の全容をまとめようと奮闘しています。この作業には{mf|陛下|陛下}の関与はほとんど必要ありません。損傷した部品はすべて技術司祭の手に渡され、失われた物資はすべて交換されます。ただ1つ、私1人では補充できない資源があります。それは、人材です。我々は2000人以上の乗員を失ってしまいました。そして残念なことに、この数には簡単に交換可能な下層デッキのクズどもだけでなく、訓練されたプロフェッショナルも含まれているのです」

languages.text: "Wir arbeiten Tag und Nacht, um eine vollständige Verlustaufstellung zusammenzustellen. Zu dieser Aufgabe muss Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} praktisch nichts beitragen – ich werde persönlich dafür sorgen, dass alle beschädigten Komponenten den Techpriestern übergeben und alle verlorenen Vorräte ersetzt werden. Nur eine Ressource kann ich nicht im Alleingang kompensieren, und das sind Menschen. Wir haben mehr als zweitausend Crewmitglieder verloren, und leider bezieht sich diese Zahl nicht nur auf den Abschaum in den unteren Decks, der leicht zu ersetzen ist, sondern auch auf gut ausgebildete Fachkräfte."
languages.original_text: "We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crew members, and, unfortunately, this number is not confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

traits.locale_text: "Wir arbeiten Tag und Nacht, um eine vollständige Verlustaufstellung zusammenzustellen. Zu dieser Aufgabe muss Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} praktisch nichts beitragen – ich werde persönlich dafür sorgen, dass alle beschädigten Komponenten den Techpriestern übergeben und alle verlorenen Vorräte ersetzt werden. Nur eine Ressource kann ich nicht im Alleingang kompensieren, und das sind Menschen. Wir haben mehr als zweitausend Crewmitglieder verloren, und leider bezieht sich diese Zahl nicht nur auf den Abschaum in den unteren Decks, der leicht zu ersetzen ist, sondern auch auf gut ausgebildete Fachkräfte."

languages.text: « Nous travaillons d'arrache-pied pour dresser un bilan complet des pertes subies. Cette tâche ne nécessitera pratiquement aucune intervention de la part de Votre Seigneurie. Je veillerai personnellement à ce que tous les composants endommagés soient confiés aux technoprêtres et que tous les stocks perdus soient remplacés. Il y a cependant une ressource que je ne peux renouveler à moi seul, la ressource humaine. Nous avons perdu plus de deux mille membres d'équipage. Malheureusement, ce nombre ne se limite pas à la racaille des ponts inférieurs que l'on peut aisément remplacer, il comprend également des professionnels qualifiés. »
languages.original_text: "We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crew members, and, unfortunately, this number is not confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

traits.locale_text: « Nous travaillons d'arrache-pied pour dresser un bilan complet des pertes subies. Cette tâche ne nécessitera pratiquement aucune intervention de la part de Votre Seigneurie. Je veillerai personnellement à ce que tous les composants endommagés soient confiés aux technoprêtres et que tous les stocks perdus soient remplacés. Il y a cependant une ressource que je ne peux renouveler à moi seul, la ressource humaine. Nous avons perdu plus de deux mille membres d'équipage. Malheureusement, ce nombre ne se limite pas à la racaille des ponts inférieurs que l'on peut aisément remplacer, il comprend également des professionnels qualifiés. »

languages.text: «Nos estamos esforzando día y noche para recopilar un registro exhaustivo de las pérdidas. Esta tarea no requiere ningún esfuerzo por parte de mi{mf|lord|lady}; me aseguraré personalmente de que todos los componentes dañados llegan a manos de los tecnosacerdotes para su inspección y que todos los suministros perdidos se reemplazan. Solo hay un recurso que no puedo recuperar desde mi posición: el personal. Hemos perdido más de dos mil tripulantes y, por desgracia, la cifra no solo incluye a la escoria de las cubiertas inferiores, que es fácil de reemplazar, sino que también incluye a profesionales con experiencia».
languages.original_text: "We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crew members, and, unfortunately, this number is not confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

traits.locale_text: «Nos estamos esforzando día y noche para recopilar un registro exhaustivo de las pérdidas. Esta tarea no requiere ningún esfuerzo por parte de mi{mf|lord|lady}; me aseguraré personalmente de que todos los componentes dañados llegan a manos de los tecnosacerdotes para su inspección y que todos los suministros perdidos se reemplazan. Solo hay un recurso que no puedo recuperar desde mi posición: el personal. Hemos perdido más de dos mil tripulantes y, por desgracia, es un número limitado a la escoria de las cubiertas inferiores, que es fácil de reemplazar, pero también incluye a profesionales con experiencia».

languages.text: "Kayıpların tam bir listesini derlemek için gece gündüz çalışıyoruz. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin hemen hemen hiçbir müdahalede bulunması gerekmiyor. Tüm hasarlı bileşenlerin bakım için Tekno Rahiplere verilmesi ve eksik malzemelerin yenilenmesiyle şahsen ilgileneceğim. Bizzat yenileyemeyeceğim tek bir kaynak var, o da insan gücü. İki binden fazla tayfa kaybettik. Ölenlerin çoğunu alt güvertelerde bol bulunan ayaktakımı oluştursa da ne yazık ki aralarında eğitimli profesyoneller de bulunuyordu."
languages.original_text: "We are toiling day and night to compile a full account of the losses. The task will require next to no involvement from Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — I will personally ensure that all damaged components are given into the Tech-Priests' hands for attention and that all lost supplies are replaced. There is only one resource that I cannot replenish single-handedly, and that is people. We have lost more than two thousand crew members, and, unfortunately, this number is not confined to the scum from the lower decks, which are easily replaced, but also includes trained professionals."

traits.locale_text: "Kayıpların tam bir listesini derlemek için gece gündüz çalışıyoruz. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin hemen hemen hiçbir müdahalede bulunması gerekmiyor. Tüm hasarlı bileşenlerin bakım için Tekno Rahiplere verilmesi ve eksik malzemelerin yenilenmesiyle şahsen ilgileneceğim. Bizzat yenileyemeyeceğim tek bir kaynak var, o da insan gücü. İki binden fazla tayfa kaybettik. Ölenlerin çoğunu alt güvertelerde bol bulunan ayaktakımı oluştursa da ne yazık ki aralarında eğitimli profesyoneller de bulunuyordu."
